column3: Faculty of Health Medicine and Life Sciences
column5: Health and Digital TransformationAre you interested in digital technology and healthcare? Do you want to help translate and facilitate healthcare innovations for patients, citizens, and professionals? If so, this master's programme is the right fit for you. You'll have the opportunity to apply your knowledge and skills directly in practice and advise organizations on how to navigate through digital challenges.
column7: Academic year 2024/2025 The statutory fee for this programme is: € 2,530 The institutional fee for this programme is: € 19,100 The statutory part time fee for this programme is: € 1,801 The institutional part time fee for this programme is: € 9,550
